channel.title: Three movies
channel.description:
So I wanted to here some reviews on these three movies,
A Serious Man Tropic Thunder The Hangover
So what comical movie should I watch?

item.title: Three movies
item.dc:creator: @lawl lawl
item.description:
@lawl wrote:

[quote=“chrisn2323, post:12, topic:344438”]The hangover was ok

tropic thunder was hilarious

you may also like I love you man which is funnier than both of those[/quote]
i agree with 1 and 3 but i think tropic thunder was meh
